data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Southern Highlands, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern Highlands, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 117,306 believers in Southern Highlands and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Over 5.62 percent of the people of Southern Highlands are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Southern Highlands to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Southern Highlands, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 117,306 believers in Southern Highlands to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 117,306 believers in Southern Highlands against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
